sentences.english: He stood, huddled by the open fire, gazing at the dying embers.
sentences.chinese: 他只是木然地站在爐火旁，看着那漸漸滅去的灰燼。

sentences.english: Gradually,it became a stage show on its own in the eighteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在十八世紀，芭蕾漸漸地發展成爲了一種舞臺表演。

sentences.english: The news of her divorce gradually rippled outwards.
sentences.chinese: 她離婚的消息漸漸向外傳開。

sentences.english: Deception and deceptive, gradually became the most people.
sentences.chinese: 自欺與欺人，漸漸成了大多數人的愛好。

sentences.english: The sound of rain gradually faded away, and a piece of slight light indistinctly came though the curtain.
sentences.chinese: 雨聲漸漸的住了，窗簾後隱隱的透進清光來。

sentences.english: And the Philistine came on and drew near unto David; and the man that bare the shield went before him.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人也漸漸的迎着大衛來拿盾牌的走在前頭。

sentences.english: Image CreditWhen reduced to begging in enclaves of humanity, the birds can often lose some of the wildness.
sentences.chinese: 在人類居住地乞食的鶴鴕漸漸的就會失去野性。

sentences.english: As I sat there in the silence, the fire grew larger.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在這片寂靜中，爐火漸漸旺起來。

sentences.english: Gradually, I can not run as fast as I did.
sentences.chinese: 漸漸地，我發覺自己跑得慢了下來。

sentences.english: What have I been doing in that eight- thousand-day rush, apart from hesitating?
sentences.chinese: 正在八千少日的漸漸裏，除彷徨外，又剩些什麼呢？

sentences.english: Gradually, the sky lit up, sea, and days have become clear when.
sentences.chinese: 漸漸地，天空亮了起來，海和天也變得分明瞭。

sentences.english: In April 1709 winter began to loosen its grip on the Ukraine.
sentences.chinese: 1709年4月，烏克蘭的冬天開始漸漸褪去。

sentences.english: The Lord your God will drive those nations out ahead of you little by little. You will not clear them away all at once .... Deuteronomy 7:22
sentences.chinese: 耶和華你們的神必將這些國的民從你面前漸漸趕出。

sentences.english: He wormed himself into my confidence and betrayed me after that.
sentences.chinese: 他漸漸騙取了我的信任，但隨後背叛了我。

sentences.english: By that time Tina and Max were beginning to feel less anxious.
sentences.chinese: 這時蒂娜和邁克斯漸漸開始感到不那麼着急了。

sentences.english: The manner to father had Chen Sanchuan to change gradually.
sentences.chinese: 陳三川對父親的態度漸漸有了改觀。

definition: to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
